title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Experiential Hybrid Science Education Program for Learner Success

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific theories but no practical application experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can reconstruct science education modules using a 4-stage design process (preparation-design-development-implementation).
Learners can develop assessment tools based on constructively aligned principles in blended learning environments.
Learners can apply collaborative learning design processes that facilitate organizational culture change to practical settings.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
